name: Royal Dash
description:
Welcome to Checkmate Castle, a Kingdom that exists independently and separate from the rest of the world. Recently, the ruler that resides over Checkmate Castle passed away, thus creating a vacancy in the throne that must be filled. In order to fill that vacancy, eight leaders were summoned from different time periods and eras to compete for the chance to take the throne for themselves. Are you ready to race towards victory in this Royal Dash?

(2-8 Players)

This game is a card game that is derived from the mechanics and theme of Chess.

https://tabletopia.com/playground/royal-dash-b5n5f5/play-now
